description.value: The Tau can perform the following special action. Perfect Lure: Full Action, Movement: Make +0 Fellowship Test, if successful one enemy within 30 metres gains +10 to Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill tests to hit the character, but suffer -30 to hit any of the explorer's allies. For every degree of success, one additional enemy within range may be affected.
